==Trivia==
* This soundtrack cannot immediately play upon entering the The Glowing Narrows subarea as ''A Path to Delusions'' is guaranteed to play instead. ''A Route to Fantasies'' will then play on loop after ''A Path to Delusions'' finishes playing or after exiting combat.
